snippet.title: Mega Drive Longplay [063] Valis: The Fantasm Soldier
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.net

Played by: Valis77

Hmmm let's me get this straight, A cliche highschool girl (Yuko Asho) with a "Magic Sword"(Sword of Valis) fighting monsters......HOW AWSOME IS THAT?...ok it's not that awsome but,This is where i got my handle name from. An action sidescrolling game that many people overlooked. It spawned many sequels and ports on various consoles. Be warned! LOOONG CUTSCENES. Many people don't like them it's no wonder we can't have good things. Ok im done talking, just watch the video! -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
